This program requires us to pass the password as an argument. Inside the main function a conditional checks if an argument has been given, and if it has it compares the given password against the stored password inside the _validate_key function. Inside it we can find â€œuedfluefeqcfdofodcsdoweogey4857498549fneuncqpnâ€ which serves as the stored password.
